name: Nighttime
description:
Watch the night sky on a foreign planet and snap some pictures of constellations or falling meteors.

I was planning on introducing some sort of progression mechanic but wanted to focus on the visuals of things a bit more (even though the meteors are a bit buggy), so its really just an environment to take cool pictures. I'd love to continue this and build it into something where you can capture photos of more complex astrological events (i.e. planets, comets, nebulas) as this was a ton of fun to create.

This was created in Godot (using the new version 4 beta).

Font used: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Permanent+Marker?query=marker
